findings.quote: Based on empirical studies of lottery winners and inheritance recipients.
findings.issue: Invalid generalization - lottery/inheritance effects may not apply to regular UBI payments
Oversimplified GDP calculation - ignores multiplier effects and economic complexity
Confidence interval terminology incorrect for simulation - should be "credible interval"

findings.quote: The model assumes uniform effects across demographics
findings.issue: Homogeneity assumption likely invalid - labor supply elasticity varies significantly by income
Testing mean of distribution ignores full uncertainty range in validation
